itunes:title: #48: The 4 Things Breaking Up Your Relationship
title: #48: The 4 Things Breaking Up Your Relationship
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: When it comes to improving our relationship health, we have to look at OUR part and what we may be contributing to the relationship. We'll be digging into 4 things to look out for and how it may be connected to your trauma. MENTIONED IN THIS EPISODE...
itunes:summary:
When it comes to improving our relationship health, we have to look at OUR part and what we may be contributing to the relationship. We'll be digging into 4 things to look out for and how it may be connected to your trauma.
